Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States, on behalf of the Congress, to present a gold medal to Sargent Shriver.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to present, on behalf of Congress, a congressional gold medal to Sargent Shriver to commemorate the 40th anniversary of the establishment of the Peace Corps, and to recognize his incomparable contribution as its first Director.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States, on behalf of the Congress, to present a gold medal to Sargent Shriver.
